remarks: Limit of the product of two functions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
mullimc.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
mullimc.g $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
mullimc.h $e |- H = ( x e. A |-> ( B x. C ) ) $.
mullimc.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
mullimc.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
mullimc.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( F limCC D ) ) $.
mullimc.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( G limCC D ) ) $.
mullimc $p |- ( ph -> ( X x. Y ) e. ( H limCC D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
